title: Why did I get this skin?
body:
http://i.gyazo.com/501d4da98c29d26d4ce67a1f9c994dcf.png

STOP RELEASING OLD SKINS FOR NEW SCRUBS TO USE, THIS COMPLETELY DEVALUES THE RARITY OF THE SKIN, FOR FUCK SAKE RIOT!

replies.body:
"this completely devalues the skin" The skin is of no value at all to riot if no one can buy it...
who cares what its value is, its worthless to everyone if no one can enjoy either the money made by selling it or by actually using it.

like PAX TF for example, so few people have it that most players will never even see it in their whole careers of Lol let alone play it.
Riot make no money from it at all, plus they have to contend with reports of people who paid hundreds for a fake code on ebay. plus the splash and 3d artists never get their work seen, it causes nothing but problems for everyone but the few who have it. 

however if riot were to re-sell it, they would make a lot of money, people would be able to enjoy the skin (which to be frank is the whole purpose) and the few people who do have it don't lose anything. infact they gain an icon and special treatment in the loading screen, how is that not a win-win situation?

Except the PAX Skin codes were disabled, as were all the other old skins codes. So now people CAN'T buy them from third parties and they'll never be released again.

Honestly I see PAX TF almost every game I play with my friends.
And PAX Jax everytime I play Jax.
And PAX Sivir about half the time I play Sivir.
And Silver Kayle about 90% of the time I play Kayle.

Exactly but people still play that money because they are fooled, like i said it causes a headache for riot.

umm... your probably see those skins a lot because you and your friend own them...

the majority of people dont own them and so dont see them,

It's not Riot's fault if people are stupid.
If you get fooled when it was clearly stated that those skins will never be available again and all the old skin codes are turned off, it's your own fault.

Yeah I see them because I have the skins and my friends have them too. (Except Silver Kayle, I'm the only one in my group with it)

But we still spread them around a lot, letting other people experience them.
Though I kinda don't like using PAX Sivir, even though it's probably my all time favourite skin, I get 5 man ganked constantly while using it.

I know its not riots fault but they still get the angry support tickets, so they still have to deal with it :/

yea but most people don't have them so you are one of the lucky ones, i wish i had them. 

im glad you use them a lot so that others can see them, one of my friends has silver kayle and i always get him to play it haha

I would play them more, but like I said, if I play PAX Sivir I get five man ganked all game, and it's a pain in the ass.

Like if you play Spirit Guard Udyr your jungle will be camped all game.
